function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of infectious diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Significant impact on public health, economy, and society","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective public health measures, travel restrictions, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and vaccine development technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and international travelers","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and international health agencies"}]}
